Name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
Star: Tom Holland, Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch, Jacob Batalon
Summary: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

Name: The Witcher
Star: Henry Cavill, Freya Allan, Anya Chalotra, Mimi Ndiweni
Summary: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

Name: The Wheel of Time
Star: Rosamund Pike, Daniel Henney, Madeleine Madden, Zoë Robins
Summary: Set in a high fantasy world where magic exists, but only some can access it, a woman named Moiraine crosses paths with five young men and women. This sparks a dangerous, world-spanning journey. Based on the book series by Robert Jordan.

Name: Encanto
Director: Jared Bush, Byron Howard, Charise Castro Smith
Star: Stephanie Beatriz, María Cecilia Botero, John Leguizamo, Mauro Castillo
Summary: A young Colombian girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

Name: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
Star: Benedict Cumberbatch, Elizabeth Olsen, Rachel McAdams, Xochitl Gomez
Summary: Plot unknown. Sequel to the 2016 Marvel film 'Doctor Strange'.

Name: It's a Wonderful Life
Star: James Stewart, Donna Reed, Lionel Barrymore, Thomas Mitchell
Summary: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Name: Station Eleven
Star: Joe Pingue, Mackenzie Davis, Himesh Patel, Matilda Lawler
Summary: A post apocalyptic saga spanning multiple timelines, telling the stories of survivors of a devastating flu as they attempt to rebuild and reimagine the world anew while holding on to the best of what's been lost.

Name: Arcane
Star: Hailee Steinfeld, Kevin Alejandro, Jason Spisak, Harry Lloyd
Summary: Set in utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League champions-and the power that will tear them apart.

Name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
Star: Jim Carrey, Taylor Momsen, Kelley, Jeffrey Tambor
Summary: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

Name: Daredevil
Star: Charlie Cox, Vincent D'Onofrio, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson
Summary: A blind lawyer by day, vigilante by night. Matt Murdock fights the crime of New York as Daredevil.

Name: Game of Thrones
Star: Emilia Clarke, Peter Dinklage, Kit Harington, Lena Headey
Summary: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

Name: Elf
Star: Will Ferrell, James Caan, Bob Newhart, Zooey Deschanel
Summary: Raised as an over-sized elf, a human travels from the North Pole to NYC to meet his biological father who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.

Name: A Boy Called Christmas
Star: Maggie Smith, Isabella O'Sullivan, Joel Fry, Eden Lawrence
Summary: In this origin story of Father Christmas, an ordinary boy (with a loyal pet mouse and a reindeer at his side) sets out on an extraordinary adventure to find his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of Elfhelm.

Name: The Santa Clause
Star: Tim Allen, Judge Reinhold, Wendy Crewson, Eric Lloyd
Summary: When a man inadvertently makes Santa fall off of his roof on Christmas Eve, he finds himself magically recruited to take his place.

Name: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
Star: Simu Liu, Awkwafina, Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Ben Kingsley
Summary: Shang-Chi, the master of weaponry-based Kung Fu, is forced to confront his past after being drawn into the Ten Rings organization.

Name: The Grinch
Star: Benedict Cumberbatch, Cameron Seely, Rashida Jones, Pharrell Williams
Summary: A grumpy Grinch (Benedict Cumberbatch) plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

Name: Scrooged
Star: Bill Murray, Karen Allen, John Forsythe, John Glover
Summary: A selfish, cynical television executive is haunted by three spirits bearing lessons on Christmas Eve.

Name: The Polar Express
Star: Tom Hanks, Chris Coppola, Michael Jeter, Leslie Zemeckis
Summary: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

Name: Eternals
Star: Gemma Chan, Richard Madden, Angelina Jolie, Salma Hayek
Summary: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

Name: Titans
Star: Brenton Thwaites, Anna Diop, Ryan Potter, Teagan Croft
Summary: A team of young superheroes combat evil and other perils.

Name: Last Train to Christmas
Star: Michael Sheen, Cary Elwes, Nathalie Emmanuel, Katherine Kelly
Summary: Tony Towers is a local celebrity, a successful nightclub manager and he is engaged to a younger woman, Sue. Things get a little strange when he embarks upon the 3:17 to Nottingham for a Christmas family reunion.

Name: Last Christmas
Star: Madison Ingoldsby, Emma Thompson, Boris Isakovic, Lucy Miller
Summary: Kate is a young woman subscribed to bad decisions. Working as an elf in a year round Christmas store is not good for the wannabe singer. However, she meets Tom there. Her life takes a new turn. For Kate, it seems too good to be true.

Name: The Mandalorian
Star: Pedro Pascal, Carl Weathers, Barry Lowin, Gina Carano
Summary: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

Name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Director: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
Star: Shameik Moore, Jake Johnson, Hailee Steinfeld, Mahershala Ali
Summary: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Star: Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, Richard Harris, Maggie Smith
Summary: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

Name: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
Star: Alison Sudol, Mads Mikkelsen, Jude Law, Katherine Waterston
Summary: The third installment of the 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them' series which follows the adventures of Newt Scamander.

Name: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
Star: Carrie Coon, Paul Rudd, Finn Wolfhard, Mckenna Grace
Summary: When a single mom and her two kids arrive in a small town, they begin to discover their connection to the original Ghostbusters and the secret legacy their grandfather left behind.

Name: Free Guy
Star: Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Taika Waititi, Lil Rel Howery
Summary: A bank teller discovers that he's actually an NPC inside a brutal, open world video game.

Name: Supernatural
Star: Jared Padalecki, Jensen Ackles, Jim Beaver, Misha Collins
Summary: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters, fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds, including monsters, demons and gods that roam the earth.

Name: Rumble
Star: Geraldine Viswanathan, Will Arnett, Stephen A. Smith, Terry Crews
Summary: In a world where monster wrestling is a global sport and monsters are superstar athletes, teenage Winnie seeks to follow in her father's footsteps by coaching a loveable underdog monster into a champion.

Name: The Santa Clause 2
Star: Tim Allen, Spencer Breslin, Elizabeth Mitchell, Eric Lloyd
Summary: Scott Calvin has been a humble Santa Claus for nearly ten years, but it might come to an end if he doesn't find a Mrs. Claus.

Name: The Christmas Chronicles
Star: Kurt Russell, Darby Camp, Judah Lewis, Oliver Hudson
Summary: The story of sister and brother, Kate and Teddy Pierce, whose Christmas Eve plan to catch Santa Claus on camera turns into an unexpected journey that most kids could only dream about.

Name: Stranger Things
Star: Millie Bobby Brown, Finn Wolfhard, Winona Ryder, David Harbour
Summary: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

Name: The Muppet Christmas Carol
Star: Michael Caine, Dave Goelz, Steve Whitmire, Jerry Nelson
Summary: The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.

Name: Loki
Star: Tom Hiddleston, Owen Wilson, Gugu Mbatha-Raw, Sophia Di Martino
Summary: The mercurial villain Loki resumes his role as the God of Mischief in a new series that takes place after the events of “Avengers: Endgame.”

Name: A Christmas Carol
Star: Jim Carrey, Gary Oldman, Colin Firth, Steve Valentine
Summary: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

Name: Attack on Titan
Star: Yûki Kaji, Marina Inoue, Josh Grelle, Yui Ishikawa
Summary: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Jaeger vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans that have brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

Name: WandaVision
Star: Elizabeth Olsen, Paul Bettany, Kathryn Hahn, Teyonah Parris
Summary: Blends the style of classic sitcoms with the MCU, in which Wanda Maximoff and Vision - two super-powered beings living their ideal suburban lives - begin to suspect that everything is not as it seems.

Name: Krampus
Star: Adam Scott, Toni Collette, David Koechner, Allison Tolman
Summary: A boy who has a bad Christmas accidentally summons a festive demon to his family home.

Name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Star: Natsuki Hanae, Zach Aguilar, Hiro Shimono, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka
Summary: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Name: Outlander
Star: Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton
Summary: An English combat nurse from 1945 is mysteriously swept back in time to 1743.

Name: Miracle on 34th Street
Star: Richard Attenborough, Elizabeth Perkins, Dylan McDermott, J.T. Walsh
Summary: A lawyer and a little girl must prove that a man claiming to be Santa Claus is the real thing.

Name: Gremlins
Star: Zach Galligan, Phoebe Cates, Hoyt Axton, John Louie
Summary: A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

Name: The Witcher: Blood Origin
Star: Michelle Yeoh, Laurence O'Fuarain, Jacob Collins-Levy, Lenny Henry
Summary: Prequel to the Netflix series 'The Witcher', set in an elven world 1,200 years before the show, centering on the origins of the very first Witcher.

Name: A Christmas Carol
Star: Alastair Sim, Jack Warner, Kathleen Harrison, Mervyn Johns
Summary: Ebenezer Scrooge, a curmudgeonly, miserly businessman, has no time for sentimentality and largely views Christmas as a waste of time. However, this Christmas Eve he will be visited by three spirits who will show him the errors of his ways.

Name: Midnight Mass
Star: Kate Siegel, Zach Gilford, Kristin Lehman, Samantha Sloyan
Summary: An isolated island community experiences miraculous events - and frightening omens - after the arrival of a charismatic, mysterious young priest.

Name: Lucifer
Star: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, D.B. Woodside
Summary: Lucifer Morningstar has decided he's had enough of being the dutiful servant in Hell and decides to spend some time on Earth to better understand humanity. He settles in Los Angeles - the City of Angels.

Name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Star: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom, Sean Bean
Summary: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

Name: Thor: Love and Thunder
Star: Natalie Portman, Taika Waititi, Karen Gillan, Matt Damon
Summary: The sequel to Thor: Ragnarok and the fourth movie in the Thor saga.

Name: A Christmas Carol
Star: George C. Scott, Frank Finlay, Angela Pleasence, Edward Woodward
Summary: A bitter old miser who rationalizes his uncaring nature learns real compassion when three spirits visit him on Christmas Eve.
